summary:
You all know the Trasmute Ores Spell, but now you can even Transmute Ingots! 

Iron to Silver and Silver to Gold!
descriptionHtml:
You all know the Trasmute Ores Spell, but now you can even Transmute Ingots! 

========================================================================================
UPDATE 1.1: Added a new Spell wich allows you to transmute gold Ingots into Corundum Ingots, and Corundum into Dwarven Ingots!
You will find the Spelltome in a Frost Atronach in front of High Hrothgar(screenshot).
========================================================================================

Iron to Silver and Silver to Gold! 
If YOU want me to make other Transmute spells (for example Iron Sword to Deadric Sword^^) then feel free to leave your suggestions in the comments. 

Where to find the Spelltome?: You can find the Spelltome in a Burnt Corpse in Whiterun, under the Bridge in front of the Dragonsreach (screenshot). 

If you find any Bugs please tell me so I can fix them :) 

Hope you like it and have fun with this little mod!
author: T3rRoR_SoLdi3R
